column4: Microsoft launches cloud-based blockchain platform with Brooklyn start-up
column5: LONDON Microsoft launched a cloud-based blockchain platform on Tuesday with Brooklyn-based start-up ConsensYs  which will allow financial institutions to experiment cheaply and easily with the technology underpinning bitcoin.

column4: Microsoft launches cloud-based blockchain platform with Brooklyn start-up
column5: LONDON  Nov 10 Microsoft launched a cloud-based blockchain platform on Tuesday with Brooklyn-based start-up ConsensYs  which will allow financial institutions to experiment cheaply and easily with the technology underpinning bitcoin.

column4: Ericsson cuts market growth view  looks beyond networks
column5: STOCKHOLM Ericsson   the world's biggest mobile network equipment maker  pared back its market growth forecast on Tuesday  but said it could expand beyond its mainstay networks business  aided by a new deal with data network supplier Cisco.

column4: UPDATE 1-Ericsson cuts market growth view  looks beyond networks
column5: * Gives figures for target growth areas for first time   (Adds CEO quote  detail  share  background)
